Title: Asur 2
Description: The Asur Web Series is a special project made by Oni Sen, in collaboration with Gaurav Shukla and Vibhav Shikdar, the creators of the original Asur OTT series. Asur Season 2 will be produced by Ding Entertainment and Viacom 18 Studios and will star Arshad Warsi, Barun Sobti, Anupriya Goenka, Ridhi Dogra, and Amey Wagh.
